remarks: The ring of scalars of the closed kernel dual space.  (Contributed by NM, 16-Mar-2015.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 6-May-2015.)
statement:
lcdsca.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
lcdsca.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
lcdsca.f $e |- F = ( Scalar ` U ) $.
lcdsca.o $e |- O = ( oppR ` F ) $.
lcdsca.c $e |- C = ( ( LCDual ` K ) ` W ) $.
lcdsca.r $e |- R = ( Scalar ` C ) $.
lcdsca.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
lcdsca $p |- ( ph -> R = O ) $.
